ViewObject.Name: PublishedMQVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT pc.dict_content_code tms_code, pc.term tms_name, pc.created_by tms_created_by, l.short_name level_name, g.name Activation_Group FROM nmat_state_designee_vw s, tms.tms_def_levels l, tms.tms_predict_groups g, tms.tms_predict_contents pc, tms.tms_dict_contents c WHERE s.state in ('PUBLISHED') AND s.dict_content_id = c.dict_content_id AND l.def_level_id = c.def_level_id AND c.dict_content_id = pc.predict_content_id AND g.name = (select prop_value from nmat_properties where prop_name = 'DEFAULT_PUBLISH_RELEASE_GROUP') AND g.predict_group_id = pc.predict_group_id AND TO_CHAR(c.end_ts,'DD-MON-YYYY' ) = '15-AUG-3501' UNION SELECT pc.dict_content_code tms_code, pc.term tms_name, pc.created_by tms_created_by, l.short_name level_name, g.name pending_group_name FROM nmat_state_designee_vw s, tms.tms_def_levels l, tms.tms_predict_groups g, tms.tms_predict_contents pc WHERE s.state in ('PUBLISHED') AND s.dict_content_id = pc.predict_content_id AND l.def_level_id = pc.def_level_id AND g.name = (select prop_value from nmat_properties where prop_name = 'DEFAULT_PUBLISH_RELEASE_GROUP') AND g.predict_group_id = pc.predict_group_id AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM tms.tms_dict_contents WHERE dict_content_id = s.dict_content_id AND TO_CHAR(end_ts,'DD-MON-YYYY') = '15-AUG-3501')
